name: Trivia Vault: Mixed Trivia 2
description:
Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault: Mixed Trivia 2 and bring your thinking hat. Answer mixed category trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value. Correct answers lock in the digit code for the vault, 10 correct answers cracks the vault and awards bonus cash. Track your progress and aim for higher scores to accomplish higher ranks. Challenge yourself to beat your high score by playing multiple times and completing all 100 levels with a total of 1000 unique trivia questions.

Features:

3 New "CodeBreaker" Lifelines
100 Vaults to Crack(levels)
1000 Unique Trivia Questions
Timer Based Questions
Obtain Cash Multipliers Based on Correct Answers in a Level
3 Ranks of Accomplishment per Level
